name: outlook-calendar-api
description: API for Outlook Calendar App with MongoDB

scripts.deploy: powershell -Command "Remove-Item backend.zip -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Compress-Archive -Path api-server.js,package.json,package-lock.json,web.config,.deployment,utils,services -DestinationPath backend.zip -CompressionLevel Fastest" && az webapp deployment source config-zip --resource-group DefaultResourceGroup-EUS --name emanuelnyc-services-api --src backend.zip
